alert.note: Alert for Barton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 03 at 6:24PM CDT until October 03 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Barton County in central Kansas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 624 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pawnee Rock, or 8 miles northeast of Larned, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hoisington, Olmitz, Galatia, and Susank. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
